title: GoDog
subtitle: Designed in Figma
brief: In this project, I created a contact website between dog owners and dog keepers. The objective of this page is to make contact between them easier, having more options to search or offer a service. The design is focused on the logic of the content structure and the two types of users.
application: This application is focused in two types of users, dog owners and dog keepers. The page is used to found someone that would made a service you need or to offer yourself as a dog keeper in order to make some money.
